message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $135?
I'm still a bit above my budget, would you be willing to go down to $125?
